Package com.cmput301f17t07.ingroove.DataManagers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DataManager
    [Singleton Model Class] Singleton class representing DataManager facade (relays calls as appropriate to individual classes that manage habit, habitEvent, relationships, and user data) Allows for frontend classes to interact with the backend data--implements the DataManagerAPI so that interacting objects only have access to the methods defined in the interface
    HabitEventManager
    [Model Class] Manages the data storage of the HabitEvents--handles the online and offline functionality
    HabitManager
    [Model Class] All responsibilities of data facade related to retrieving, creating, or modifying habit data are relayed to the habit manager.
    InGroove
    [Utility Class] Used to get a Context for save/Loading from files referenced: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/17441295/android-context-without-being-in-an-activity-and-other-activity-less-programmin Created by Christopher Walter on 2017-11-10.
    MockDataManager Deprecated
    RelationshipManager
    [Model Class] Class that managers the relationships between users.
    UniqueIDGenerator
    [Utility Class] Generates a unique ID using a guessing and check scheme for new objects being inserted into a list of Identifiable objects
